definitions.definition: A tempo mark directing that a passage is to be played in a quick , lively tempo , faster than allegretto but slower than presto .
An expressive mark indicating that a passage is to be played in a lively or happy manner , not necessarily quickly.

main_definition: ( music ) A tempo mark directing that a passage is to be played in a quick , lively tempo , faster than allegretto but slower than presto .
secondary_definitions: ( music , more , traditionally ) An expressive mark indicating that a passage is to be played in a lively or happy manner , not necessarily quickly.
( music ) A passage having this mark.
